text: Alloh, hamon zotest, ki haft osmonro ʙe hec sutune, ki onro meʙined, ʙarafrost. Sipas ʙar Ars ʙaland va murtafe' gardid va oftoʙu mohro rom kard, ki har jak to zamone muajjan dar sajrand. Alloh tadʙirkunandai korhoi dunjo va oxirat ast va alomatu nisonahoi qudrati xudro ʙajon mekunad, to sumo ʙa muloqoti Parvardigoraton ʙovar kuned
